video.title: House Hunters Renovation Collection
video.synopsis: On the prowl for homes they can fix up themselves, these brave house hunters brace for challenges as they transform their dumps into dream homes.

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Claus are ready to buy a house together. Tom knows exactly what he wants and is happy to renovate, but Claus prefers something move-in ready.
episodes.title: Spanish Fixer to Spanish Dream

episodes.synopsis: A creative artist and his practical wife search for a house and tackle a major kitchen renovation.
episodes.title: Charming Contemporary Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Noemy and Stephen hope to find a home near the beach in Playa Vista, California, but they may not be on the same page when it comes to style.
episodes.title: Modern Mexican Backyard

episodes.synopsis: Bill and Meredith live in a tiny guesthouse with no stove or oven. Dreaming of a real kitchen, they set out to buy a house in the L.A. suburbs.
episodes.title: Modern Masculine Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: New Yorkers Keith and Jill buy a home in Los Angeles, but a kitchen remodel in their new house ends up being more than they bargained for.
episodes.title: New Coast, New Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: A couple seeks a house with the goal of renovating the garage, transforming it into a music studio and guest space.
episodes.title: Multifunctional Garage

episodes.synopsis: To buy a home that's big enough for their family of five, Sonia and Sean settle on a fixer and start with modernizing the outdated master suite.
episodes.title: Modernizing a Master Suite

episodes.synopsis: Ruth and Michael bought their Craftsman home before they had children. Now, with two growing kids, the couple is in dire need of more space.
episodes.title: Big Dreams, Little Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Beverly and Lester buy a home in a neighborhood they love. But when it's time to renovate, Lester's modern taste may drown out Beverly's beachy vibe.
episodes.title: Modern vs. Beachy Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Artsy couple Ben and Mashanda find a fixer with room for their creative pursuits, but they run into trouble during the renovation.
episodes.title: The Unlivable Living Room

episodes.synopsis: Tyler and Ari are ready to buy their first home together. Ari would love a pool, and Tyler has always dreamed of having his own teppanyaki grill.
episodes.title: Teppanyaki Teardown

episodes.synopsis: Janice and Brett find a Southern California house near the beach. With the help of a designer, they set out to upgrade the outdated kitchen.
episodes.title: Renovating a Surfer's Retreat

episodes.synopsis: Karen and Diana are looking for a home in California's San Fernando Valley. Diana hopes for a Craftsman-style place, while Karen wants Spanish flair.
episodes.title: Buying a House for a Fridge

episodes.synopsis: Lori and Cory have their hearts set on a vacation home in the Hollywood Hills. Lori wants something beachy, while Cory likes mid-century modern.
episodes.title: From Wisconsin to California

episodes.synopsis: With the birth of their baby, Sarah and Skye have outgrown their current home. They love Spanish style and want a place they can fully customize.
episodes.title: Midcentury to Mediterranean

episodes.synopsis: Anastasia and Eric have outgrown their rental house. While they'd both like vintage charm, Eric still wants their new space to be modern.
episodes.title: Designing a Dream Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Meghan is searching for the perfect starter home in Los Angeles's Leimert Park neighborhood, but she only wants to see Spanish-style homes.
episodes.title: All About Spanish

episodes.synopsis: Robert and Nathan are ready to upgrade from their small guest house. Robert wants a charming, granny chic home, while Nathan's all about modern.
episodes.title: Granny Chic vs. Modern

episodes.synopsis: Newlyweds Andrew and Caitlin are ready to buy their first home together. Andrew, a pastor, hopes to buy in Burbank, California, near their church.
episodes.title: Buying a First Time Fixer

episodes.synopsis: Joelle, Nick and their young son are outgrowing their condo. But when it comes to buying a home, the couple doesn't see eye to eye on style.
episodes.title: Rustic vs. Modern
